en.title: Do they agree to this plan?
en.question: Does {POP_NAME} agree to this plan?
en.subtitle: {POP_NAME} must answer this question, or you must record why {POP_NAME} could not.

agree-plan-radio.isNotEmpty: Select if they agree to the plan

does-not-agree-details.isNotEmpty: Enter details about why they do not agree

could-not-answer-details.isNotEmpty: Enter details about why they cannot answer
